mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, content, cover_url, status, like_count, comment_count, audit_remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_exchange_article (user_id, title, content, cover_url, status, like_count, comment_count, audit_remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{coverUrl}, #{status}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{auditRemark}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_exchange_article WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.user_id, u.nickname AS user_nickname, u.avatar AS user_avatar, a.title, a.content, a.cover_url, a.status, a.like_count, a.comment_count, a.create_time FROM t_exchange_article a LEFT JOIN t_user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.nickname AS user_nickname, a.title, a.cover_url, a.status, a.like_count, a.comment_count, a.audit_remark, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM t_exchange_article a LEFT JOIN t_user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.is_deleted = 0
AND a.status = #{status}
AND ( a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
